question: I occasionally have problems taking a deep breathe.  I first told my Doctor about this maybe two-three years ago. I take 10mg Paxil once a day and thought it might be Anxiety related. I also take prevacid and thought it could be acid reflux related, occasionalyy I start to cough and it doesn't produce alot of mucous but can taste like Blood.  I do not see blood. I do not have fever, but energy level is low.  I did smoke for about 10yrs and have not for the last 3yrs.  I have pain that radiates across my shoulder blades occasionally when I pick up something heavy.  I have been a Flight attendant for 15yrs.  I just had blood work done last week and my blood sugar was up to 105, I have no history of Diabetes on either side of my Family. Thank you
title: Cough
